variables.docs: This resource returns information about finishers that are available in-game.

apiDataVariables.name: ids
apiDataVariables.docs: This endpoints returns an array of cat ids.

apiElementVariables.name: unlock_details
apiElementVariables.docs: A description explaining how to acquire the finisher.

apiElementVariables.name: unlock_items
apiElementVariables.docs: An array of item ids used to unlock the finisher. Can be resolved against v2/items

apiElementVariables.name: order
apiElementVariables.docs: The order in which the finisher appears in a list.

apiElementVariables.name: icon
apiElementVariables.docs: The icon url for the finisher.

apiElementVariables.name: name
apiElementVariables.docs: The name of the finisher as it appears in-game.
